versions.changes: Initial release. You should never see this message in an update dialog.

Upgrade to build 2 for more goodness.
This is our LWM build for testing.
Ficticious upgrade used to test the Update Nag. To avoid this nag simply set your version in build.gradle to 3 or disable update nag with the flag.
